# The `SCEVPredicate` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class represents an assumption made using <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> expressions which can be checked at run-time. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::SCEVPredicate</CodeBlock>

  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevcomparepredicate">SCEVComparePredicate</a></>}>

## Description {#details}

This class represents an assumption made using <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> expressions which can be checked at run-time.

## Public Member Functions

### getComplexity() {#a4e26ec305e394c496dd3f2a16c6d58e5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="virtual unsigned llvm::SCEVPredicate::getComplexity () const"
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Returns the estimated complexity of this predicate.

This is roughly measured in the number of run-time checks required.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scalarevolution-h/#l00237">237</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scalarevolution-h">ScalarEvolution.h</a>.

### isAlwaysTrue() {#ac43f5102232a1e1819b0763536f2937a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="virtual bool llvm::SCEVPredicate::isAlwaysTrue () const">
Returns true if the predicate is always true.

This means that no assumptions were made and nothing needs to be checked at run-time.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scalarevolution-h/#l00241">241</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scalarevolution-h">ScalarEvolution.h</a>.

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a>&#39;s <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e612822d4ba7bb36c9c79582a567108">BumpPtrAllocator</a> holds the data.
